scripts.build: npm run pre-build && npm run build:sub_cjs && npm run build:sub_es && rollup -c
scripts.format: npm run format:css && npm run format:html && npm run format:js && npm run format:json && npm run format:md && npm run format:rc && npm run format:ts
scripts.prepack: npm install && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.test: npm run test:cjs && npm run test:esm
scripts.test:cjs: npm run build:sub_cjs   && mocha  'lib/test/common/**/*.js' --require  isomorphic-fetch &&  mocha  'lib/test/node/**/*.js' --require  isomorphic-fetch
scripts.test:coverage: TS_NODE_PROJECT='./tsconfig-cjs.json' nyc mocha --require isomorphic-fetch -r ts-node/register test/common/**/*.ts && mocha --require isomorphic-fetch -r ts-node/register test/common/**/*.ts
scripts.test:esm: npm run build:sub_es  && mocha  'lib/es/test/common/**/*.js' --require  esm --require  isomorphic-fetch &&  mocha  'lib/es/test/node/**/*.js' --require  esm --require  isomorphic-fetch
